content: flat top tuque materials 2 50 g balls of bernat handicrafter cotton or loops and threads cotton balls ended up using 74g 5 0 mm crochet hook stitch marker note to adjust the pattern size feel free to stop when the circle is wide enough for the top of your hat continue on to r11 after instructions top of the hat make a magic_ring 6 single_crochet in the magic_ring and join with a slip_stitch mark your first stitch in the round r1 2 single_crochet into each stitch until the end of the round and slip_stitch into the beginning single_crochet 12 stitches total r2 2 single_crochet into each stitch until the end of the round and slip_stitch into the beginning single_crochet 24 stitches total r3 2 single_crochet crochet one stitch single_crochet in the next stitch repeat until the end of the round slip_stitch in the first single_crochet 36 stitches total r4 single_crochet into each stitch and slip_stitch into the beginning single_crochet 36 stitches total r5 2 single_crochet in one stitch single_crochet into the next 3 stitches repeat until the end of the round slip_stitch in the first single_crochet 45 stitches total r6 2 single_crochet in one stitch single_crochet into the next 2 stitches repeat until the end of the round slip_stitch in the first single_crochet 60 stitches total r7 single_crochet in each stitch until the end of the round and slip_stitch into the beginning single_crochet 60 stitches in total r8 single_crochet in each stitch until the end of the round and slip_stitch into the beginning single_crochet 60 stitches total r9 2 single_crochet in the first stitch single_crochet into the next 3 stitches slip_stitch into the beginning single_crochet 75 stitches total r10 single_crochet in each stitch until the end of the round and slip_stitch into the beginning single_crochet 75 stitches total should be measuring approximately 17-17 5 cm or 6 5-7 sides of the hat r11 chain 1 single_crochet between the back posts until the end of the round slip_stitch into the first single_crochet 80 stitches total note the original hat crochets between the posts but feel free to use back loops only if that works better for you r12-20 single_crochet until the end of the round and slip_stitch into the beginning single_crochet r21 chain 2 counts as 1 double_crochet double_crochet in each following stitch until the end of the round slip_stitch into the second chain r22 single_crochet in each stitch until the end of the round slip_stitch into the first single_crochet r23 single_crochet between the front posts to the end of the round slip_stitch into the first single_crochet note the original hat crochets between the front posts but feel free to single_crochet into the front loops only if that works better for you r24 single_crochet in each stitch until the end of the round and slip_stitch into the first single_crochet continue rounds of single_crochet until you are 3cm or 1 from the desired length of the hat i
